title: [RMIT Univeristy] RMIT: League of Gaming (formely League of Legends Club)

embed.description: RMIT League of Legends Club. 545 likes Â· 7 talking about this. Promoting League of Legends at RMIT. Registered Members ONLY Group:...

body:
Hi guys! There's quite a lot interest around the Oceanic University Championship and I know that there's some of you who'd like to participate but don't have a team. No worries, we've got you covered, just follow the steps below!
Anyone can enter as long as ALL PLAYERS ARE RMIT STUDENTS (with proof of ID checks).

1) Fill in the form: http://goo.gl/forms/WcvFcEr8fd
2) And stay in contact with us by joining our Facebook group. (link on our Facebook page)
3) Rosters will be announced ASAP after we have enough people signed-up etc.
4) Last step, don't forget to officially register your team (signups close July 28th, 18:00pm AEST). You and the team will have to do that yourself.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ouc-team-registration

Any questions, ask them below.
Link to Oceanic University Championship: 
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/…/rally-your-classmates-nex…/

Come join us!

RMIT: League of Gaming

replies.body: Can I sign up by any chance?

Sorry, we've closed sign-ups since there is less than one day till the registration deadline. :(

Join our Facebook group to stay in contact with the events that are happening in RMIT!
